channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Suspect in the killing of UnitedHealthcare’s CEO struggles, shouts while entering courthouse
item.description: The suspect in the killing of UnitedHealthcare’s CEO struggled with deputies and shouted while arriving for a court appearance in Pennsylvania a day after he was arrested at a McDonald’s and charged with murder.

item.title: From wealth and success to murder suspect, the life of Luigi Mangione took a hard turn
UnitedHealthcare CEO was likely killed with a ghost gun that can be made at home
